title: The Walmart Deals event is still going strong: Save on Lego, Dyson, Instant Pot, and more.
description: The Walmart Deals event competes with Amazon Prime Day from July 8 to 13. Our Senior Shopping Reporter hunts down the top offers still live.
excerpt: Walmart Deals is live online and in stores through Sunday, July 13.
text: Walmart Deals is live online and in stores through Sunday, July 13.  By  Haley Henschel Haley Henschel Senior Shopping Reporter Haley Henschel is a Chicago-based Senior Shopping Reporter at Mashable who reviews and finds deals on popular tech, from laptops to gaming consoles and VPNs. She has years of experience covering shopping holidays and can tell you what’s actually worth buying on Black Friday and Amazon Prime Day. Her work has also explored the driving forces behind digital trends within the shopping sphere, from dupes to 12-foot skeletons. Read Full Bio  on July 12, 2025 Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Flipboard All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission. Credit: Ian Moore / Mashable Photo Composite Table of Contents Walmart's best anti-Prime Day deals at a glance: Sign up and save Walmart+ $49/year (save $49) Prime Day is officially over at Amazon, but Walmart isn't quitting yet. This year, Walmart gave Prime Day a bigger run for its money with the "Walmart Deals" savings event, which runs from July 8 to 13. The sale is two days longer than Prime Day 2025, which was only live from July 8 to 11 (making it the longest Prime Day ever). It's also twice as long as last year's Walmart Deals event, which ran for three days the week before Prime Day 2024. Shoppers can peruse Walmart Deals both online at Walmart.com/deals and in stores, which is a first for the retailer.Unlike Prime Day, Walmart Deals isn't paywalled. However, paid Walmart+ members got early online access to its offers before everyone else. Shoppers who haven't signed up for Walmart+ yet can save 50% on their first year of an annual membership through July 15, paying $49 instead of $98. On top of early access to certain sales throughout the year, the program unlocks perks like free shipping, fuel discounts, and a bonus Paramount+ Essential subscription. The latter is worth $59.99 per year on its own. Walmart's summer sale is chock-full of discounts on popular brands like Dyson, Instant Pot, Lego, Ninja, Apple, and Samsung. However, you'll also find discounts on no-name tech brands (I don't know what "RNRUO" or "VEATOOL" are, and I'm too afraid to ask). After combing through hundreds (thousands?) of deals, I managed to find some diamonds in the rough, and I've collected them all here.Of note, Walmart's deals on Apple wearables and accessories are so good that I've broken them out into their own dedicated section. AirPods are still on sale at record-low prices, and Walmart also has the USB-C Apple Pencil listed for $59, or $20 off, which initially beat Amazon and Best Buy's counter-offer by $10 — though the two retailers have since matched Walmart's pricing.Other highlights include a $200 discount on our favorite Dyson vacuum and a 50-inch Vizio QLED TV that's only $218. Mashable's TV expert, Leah Stodart, tells me that's the cheapest QLED model she's encountered anywhere so far this Prime Day. You also might be able to catch one of Walmart's restocks of the $499 Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle during its sale, but no promises.Best Walmart Apple deals Why we like itCheck out our full review of the Apple AirPods Pro.Apple's AirPods Pro 2 are a fantastic choice if you're already in the Apple world. They'll seamlessly pair with your iPhone, iPad, or MacBook and the superb noise-cancellation is a major plus. On Mashable's list of the best noise-cancelling headphones, the AirPods Pro 2 earn the accolade of the best option for Apple users. Of course, since these came out in 2023, they include the incredibly welcomed USB-C port. This Prime Day, it has the cheapest 50-inch QLED TV: a $218 Vizio model. (Amazon's cheapest 50-inch QLED is a $246.99 Hisense model, for reference.) No need to settle for noticeably dull colors if your living room or bedroom can't fit a massive display.More TV deals at WalmartVizio 50-inch Quantum Pro 4K QLED TV — $398 $629 (save $231)Hisense 55-inch U6HR Series QLED 4K TV — $248 $278 (save $30)TCL 55-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $447.99 $799.99 (save $352)Hisense 55-Inch U8 Series Mini-LED Pro+ 4K TV — $648 $1,099.99 (save $451.99)Hisense 65-Inch A7 Series 4K TV — $298 $448 (save $150)TCL 65-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $547.99 $999.99 (save $452)Hisense 75-inch U6H Series 4K QLED TV — $448 $698 (save $250)Vizio 75-inch Quantum Pro 4K QLED TV — $748 $998 (save $250)TCL 75-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $798 $1,299.99 (save $501.99)Hisense 75-inch U8 Series Mini-LED Pro+ 4K TV — $1,098 $1,999.99 (save $901.99)TCL 85-inch Q6 4K QLED TV — $798 $1,599.99 (save $801.99)TCL 85-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $998 $1,999 (save $1,001.99)TCL 98-inch Q6 4K QLED TV — $1,498 $3,999.99 (save $2,501.99)TCL 98-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $1,798 $2,999.99 (save $1,201.99)Home theater equipmentRoku Express — $17 $29 (save $12)Vizio V-Series All-in-One 2.1 Home Theater Soundbar — $68 $98 (save $30)Samsung Q-series 3.1ch. Dolby Atmos Soundbar — $169 $379 (save $210)Best Walmart Deals gaming offers Why we like itIf your PC gaming setup could benefit from a little more screen real estate, Walmart's deal on this 28-inch, 144Hz 4K Samsung Odyssey monitor is pretty stellar: At $299 (normally $699.99), it's almost 60% off. That's $100 better than the same monitor's sale price on Samsung's website. Out of all the offers featured in Walmart's summer sale, I think I'm most surprised that this one hasn't sold out yet. Her favorite Dyson vacuum for most people just became a better choice for even more people — because it's now on sale for $450. (It got even cheaper during Walmart's 2024 Black Friday sale, but its current price is only $50 away from that all-time low.) The V12 Detect Slim the most affordable Dyson vacuum equipped with its green laser, which pinpoints dust and hair on the floor that you may not see otherwise. This model also comes with a motorized mini hair screw tool for tackling pet hair on furniture.Stick vacuumsShark Detect Pro — $179.99 $279 (save $99.01)Dyson V7 Advanced — $229.99 $399.99 (save $170)Air purifiersDyson Purifier Cool TP07 — $399.99 $649.99 (save $250)Kitchen appliancesInstant Pot Superior Slow Cooker Chef Series — $48.30 $69 (save $20.70)Ninja Cold Press Juicer Pro — $49 $119 (save $70)Chefman TurboFry Touch Easy-View 6-Quart Air Fryer — $49.99 $69.99 (save $50)Keurig K-Mini Plus — $58 $119.99 (save $61.99)Keurig K-Brew + Chill — $95.06 $199.99 (save $104.92)Keurig K-Supreme Smart — $97 $179.99 (save $82.99)KitchenAid 5.5-Quart Bowl-Lift Stand Mixer — $279 $449.99 (save $170.99)Best Walmart Lego deals Why we like itLego released this 2,336-piece Land Rover Defender build as part of its "Icons" series in spring 2023 to mark the off-roader's 75th anniversary. Its website has it flagged as "hard to find," and indeed, it's sold out on Amazon. Conversely, Walmart has it stock at the discounted price of $179, which works out to a $60-ish savings. Data on the Amazon price-tracking site CamelCamelCamel shows that it's never gone on sale there before, so this is likely its lowest price yet.More Lego dealsLego Jurassic World Baby Bumpy: Ankylosaurus — $15 $24.99 (save $9.99)Lego Disney Antonio's Animal Sanctuary — $26.75 $39.99 (save $13.24)Lego Super Mario Soda Jungle Maker Set — $34 $54.99 (save $20.99)Lego Star Wars Ahsoka Tano's Duel on Peridea — $26.75 $54.99 (save $28.24)Lego Batman Construction Figure and the Bat-Pod Bike — $26.75 $64.99 (save $38.24)Lego Disney Maleficent’s Dragon Form — $26.75 $69.99 (save $43.24)Lego Marvel Endgame Final Battle — $60.45 $99.99 (save $39.54)Even more tech deals at WalmartSkullcandy Smokin' Buds — $14.88 $19.88 (save $5)JLab Go Air Pop — $17.49 $29.99 (save $12.50)JBL Vibe Flex 2 — $39.88 $69.95 (save $30.07)Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 — $69 $149 (save $80)Cricut Joy — $99 $179 (save $80)Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic (Bluetooth, 47mm) — $129 $349 (save $220)Samsung 32-inch Smart Monitor M5 — $179.99 $299.99 (save $120)Dyson Supersonic (Refurbished) — $209.99 $349.99 (save $140)Dyson Airwrap (Refurbished) — $339.99 $499.99 (save $160) UPDATE: Jul. 12, 2025, 1:10 p.m. EDT We've price-checked all of the deals in this story and added more info about availability. html:
Walmart Deals is live online and in stores through Sunday, July 13.

 By 

Haley Henschel

Haley Henschel

Senior Shopping Reporter

Haley Henschel is a Chicago-based Senior Shopping Reporter at Mashable who reviews and finds deals on popular tech, from laptops to gaming consoles and VPNs. She has years of experience covering shopping holidays and can tell you what’s actually worth buying on Black Friday and Amazon Prime Day. Her work has also explored the driving forces behind digital trends within the shopping sphere, from dupes to 12-foot skeletons.

Read Full Bio

 on July 12, 2025

Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Flipboard

All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission.

Credit: Ian Moore / Mashable Photo Composite

Table of Contents

Walmart's best anti-Prime Day deals at a glance:

Sign up and save

Walmart+

$49/year (save $49)

Prime Day is officially over at Amazon, but Walmart isn't quitting yet. This year, Walmart gave Prime Day a bigger run for its money with the "Walmart Deals" savings event, which runs from July 8 to 13. The sale is two days longer than Prime Day 2025, which was only live from July 8 to 11 (making it the longest Prime Day ever). It's also twice as long as last year's Walmart Deals event, which ran for three days the week before Prime Day 2024. Shoppers can peruse Walmart Deals both online at Walmart.com/deals and in stores, which is a first for the retailer.

Unlike Prime Day, Walmart Deals isn't paywalled. However, paid Walmart+ members got early online access to its offers before everyone else. Shoppers who haven't signed up for Walmart+ yet can save 50% on their first year of an annual membership through July 15, paying $49 instead of $98. On top of early access to certain sales throughout the year, the program unlocks perks like free shipping, fuel discounts, and a bonus Paramount+ Essential subscription. The latter is worth $59.99 per year on its own.

Walmart's summer sale is chock-full of discounts on popular brands like Dyson, Instant Pot, Lego, Ninja, Apple, and Samsung. However, you'll also find discounts on no-name tech brands (I don't know what "RNRUO" or "VEATOOL" are, and I'm too afraid to ask). After combing through hundreds (thousands?) of deals, I managed to find some diamonds in the rough, and I've collected them all here.

Of note, Walmart's deals on Apple wearables and accessories are so good that I've broken them out into their own dedicated section. AirPods are still on sale at record-low prices, and Walmart also has the USB-C Apple Pencil listed for $59, or $20 off, which initially beat Amazon and Best Buy's counter-offer by $10 — though the two retailers have since matched Walmart's pricing.

Other highlights include a $200 discount on our favorite Dyson vacuum and a 50-inch Vizio QLED TV that's only $218. Mashable's TV expert, Leah Stodart, tells me that's the cheapest QLED model she's encountered anywhere so far this Prime Day. You also might be able to catch one of Walmart's restocks of the $499 Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle during its sale, but no promises.

Best Walmart Apple deals

Why we like it

Check out our full review of the Apple AirPods Pro.

Apple's AirPods Pro 2 are a fantastic choice if you're already in the Apple world. They'll seamlessly pair with your iPhone, iPad, or MacBook and the superb noise-cancellation is a major plus. On Mashable's list of the best noise-cancelling headphones, the AirPods Pro 2 earn the accolade of the best option for Apple users. Of course, since these came out in 2023, they include the incredibly welcomed USB-C port.

More Apple deals at Walmart

  • Apple AirPods 4 — $89 $129 (save $40)

  • Apple AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation — $119 $179 (save $60)

  • Apple AirPods Pro 2 — $149 $249 (save $100)

  • Apple Watch SE, 2nd Gen (GPS, 40mm) — $169 $249 (save $80)

  • Apple Watch SE, 2nd Gen (GPS + cellular, 40mm) — $219 $299 (save $80)

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS, 42mm) — $279 $399 (save $120)

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS + cellular, 42mm) — $379 $499 (save $120)

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS + cellular, 42mm) — $579 $699 (save $120)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 13-inch (M1, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD) — $599 $649 (save $50)

  • Apple Pencil (USB-C) — $59 $79 (save $20)

Best Walmart Deals TV offers

Why we like it

Walmart typically offers the cheapest TV deals in most size categories during major shopping holidays, Mashable's Stodart tells me. This Prime Day, it has the cheapest 50-inch QLED TV: a $218 Vizio model. (Amazon's cheapest 50-inch QLED is a $246.99 Hisense model, for reference.) No need to settle for noticeably dull colors if your living room or bedroom can't fit a massive display.

More TV deals at Walmart

  • Vizio 50-inch Quantum Pro 4K QLED TV — $398 $629 (save $231)

  • Hisense 55-inch U6HR Series QLED 4K TV — $248 $278 (save $30)

  • TCL 55-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $447.99 $799.99 (save $352)

  • Hisense 55-Inch U8 Series Mini-LED Pro+ 4K TV — $648 $1,099.99 (save $451.99)

  • Hisense 65-Inch A7 Series 4K TV — $298 $448 (save $150)

  • TCL 65-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $547.99 $999.99 (save $452)

  • Hisense 75-inch U6H Series 4K QLED TV — $448 $698 (save $250)

  • Vizio 75-inch Quantum Pro 4K QLED TV — $748 $998 (save $250)

  • TCL 75-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $798 $1,299.99 (save $501.99)

  • Hisense 75-inch U8 Series Mini-LED Pro+ 4K TV — $1,098 $1,999.99 (save $901.99)

  • TCL 85-inch Q6 4K QLED TV — $798 $1,599.99 (save $801.99)

  • TCL 85-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $998 $1,999 (save $1,001.99)

  • TCL 98-inch Q6 4K QLED TV — $1,498 $3,999.99 (save $2,501.99)

  • TCL 98-inch QM6K Series QD-Mini LED QLED 4K TV — $1,798 $2,999.99 (save $1,201.99)

Home theater equipment

  • Roku Express — $17 $29 (save $12)

  • Vizio V-Series All-in-One 2.1 Home Theater Soundbar — $68 $98 (save $30)

  • Samsung Q-series 3.1ch. Dolby Atmos Soundbar — $169 $379 (save $210)

Best Walmart Deals gaming offers

Why we like it

If your PC gaming setup could benefit from a little more screen real estate, Walmart's deal on this 28-inch, 144Hz 4K Samsung Odyssey monitor is pretty stellar: At $299 (normally $699.99), it's almost 60% off. That's $100 better than the same monitor's sale price on Samsung's website. Out of all the offers featured in Walmart's summer sale, I think I'm most surprised that this one hasn't sold out yet.

Mashable Deals

Consoles

  • Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World Bundle — $499 (restock)

Gaming laptops

  • MSI Thin 15 (Intel Core i5-13420H, Nvidia GeForce RTX 4050, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) — $599 $699 (save $100)

  • MSI Thin A15 (AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS, Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) — $649 $999 (save $350)

VR headsets

  • Meta Quest 3S (128GB) — $249 $299 (save $50)

Best Walmart Deals home and kitchen sales

Why we like it

Stodart also happens to be our resident vacuum guru. Her favorite Dyson vacuum for most people just became a better choice for even more people — because it's now on sale for $450. (It got even cheaper during Walmart's 2024 Black Friday sale, but its current price is only $50 away from that all-time low.) The V12 Detect Slim the most affordable Dyson vacuum equipped with its green laser, which pinpoints dust and hair on the floor that you may not see otherwise. This model also comes with a motorized mini hair screw tool for tackling pet hair on furniture.

Stick vacuums

  • Shark Detect Pro — $179.99 $279 (save $99.01)

  • Dyson V7 Advanced — $229.99 $399.99 (save $170)

Air purifiers

  • Dyson Purifier Cool TP07 — $399.99 $649.99 (save $250)

Kitchen appliances

  • Instant Pot Superior Slow Cooker Chef Series — $48.30 $69 (save $20.70)

  • Ninja Cold Press Juicer Pro — $49 $119 (save $70)

  • Chefman TurboFry Touch Easy-View 6-Quart Air Fryer — $49.99 $69.99 (save $50)

  • Keurig K-Mini Plus — $58 $119.99 (save $61.99)

  • Keurig K-Brew + Chill — $95.06 $199.99 (save $104.92)

  • Keurig K-Supreme Smart — $97 $179.99 (save $82.99)

  • KitchenAid 5.5-Quart Bowl-Lift Stand Mixer — $279 $449.99 (save $170.99)

Best Walmart Lego deals

Why we like it

Lego released this 2,336-piece Land Rover Defender build as part of its "Icons" series in spring 2023 to mark the off-roader's 75th anniversary. Its website has it flagged as "hard to find," and indeed, it's sold out on Amazon. Conversely, Walmart has it stock at the discounted price of $179, which works out to a $60-ish savings. Data on the Amazon price-tracking site CamelCamelCamel shows that it's never gone on sale there before, so this is likely its lowest price yet.

More Lego deals

  • Lego Jurassic World Baby Bumpy: Ankylosaurus — $15 $24.99 (save $9.99)

  • Lego Disney Antonio's Animal Sanctuary — $26.75 $39.99 (save $13.24)

  • Lego Super Mario Soda Jungle Maker Set — $34 $54.99 (save $20.99)

  • Lego Star Wars Ahsoka Tano's Duel on Peridea — $26.75 $54.99 (save $28.24)

  • Lego Batman Construction Figure and the Bat-Pod Bike — $26.75 $64.99 (save $38.24)

  • Lego Disney Maleficent’s Dragon Form — $26.75 $69.99 (save $43.24)

  • Lego Marvel Endgame Final Battle — $60.45 $99.99 (save $39.54)

Even more tech deals at Walmart

  • Skullcandy Smokin' Buds — $14.88 $19.88 (save $5)

  • JLab Go Air Pop — $17.49 $29.99 (save $12.50)

  • JBL Vibe Flex 2 — $39.88 $69.95 (save $30.07)

  • Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 — $69 $149 (save $80)

  • Cricut Joy — $99 $179 (save $80)

  • Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic (Bluetooth, 47mm) — $129 $349 (save $220)

  • Samsung 32-inch Smart Monitor M5 — $179.99 $299.99 (save $120)

  • Dyson Supersonic (Refurbished) — $209.99 $349.99 (save $140)

  • Dyson Airwrap (Refurbished) — $339.99 $499.99 (save $160)

UPDATE: Jul. 12, 2025, 1:10 p.m. EDT We've price-checked all of the deals in this story and added more info about availability.
